com.slickqa.client.apiparts

Interface RetrieveUpdateDeleteApi<T>

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    ProjectApi, ReleaseApi, ResultApi
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ApiPart, FilesApiPart, ProjectApiPart, ReleaseApiPart, ResultApiPart

    public interface RetrieveUpdateDeleteApi<T>
    API for doing basic Retrieve, Update, and Delete for various types. Create happens on the QueryAndCreateApi
    Author:
    Jason Corbett Created by jcorbett on 4/7/14.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void delete()
      Delete the specified object.
      T get()
      Retrieve a specific object.
      T update(T update)
      Update an object.

    • Method Detail

      • get

        T get()
      throws SlickError
        Retrieve a specific object.
        Returns:
        The object returned from slick.
        Throws:
        SlickError - on errors reported from the slick server.

      • update

        T update(T update)
         throws SlickError
        Update an object.
        Returns:
        The updated object as returned by slick.
        Throws:
        SlickError - if the slick server returns an error.

      • delete

        void delete()
            throws SlickError
        Delete the specified object.
        Throws:
        SlickError - if the slick server returns an error
